name: Hidden Object: Viking Mystery
description:
Life on the North was hard. People were strong and lived along their own rules. Their life and their secrets was different than anywhere else...
Enjoy searching for items in colorful exotic locations. Explore the world of hidden secrets of Viking lands, resolve all quests and find your way to their best kept secrets. Different game modes, cleverly hidden objects and increasing difficulty will make your adventure nice, relaxing and challenging.

Key Features:
- Hidden object adventure game in Viking World scenery
- 42 hidden object scenes
- 16 unique locations
- Over 500 objects hidden
- Match3 bonus scenes
- Zoomable scenes
- Scrollable panel with objects to find.
- Three different play modes: Picture, Silhouette, Word
- Three difficulty modes: Casual, Normal, Challenging
- HD quality of graphics
- Amazing sound effects
- Climatic music closely related with the theme of the game
